article: Dr. Brown liked reading in bed when he was at school. But it was  _  for his eyes and now he is near-sighted. He doesn't want  anybody else  to know about it and he never wears  glasses  . It often  _  him some trouble. One day he was invited to a village school. He took a bus to a small town. Then he had to  _  to the village school. The road to the village was very bad. He fell over some times and it  _  his clothes dirty.  At last  he got to the village. Suddenly it began to blow heavily and his hat was off. He felt his hat run into a fence . So he ran  _  it into the house, too. An old woman  _  him angrily and shouted ,"  _  are you running after my little duck?"
